item.title: Note when making alumniHTML
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Referece － Sticky Footer － responsive-utilities Reminder Don’t use bootstrap.js, use ui-bootstrap.js instead. jQuery is no longer useful ui-bootstrap.collapse beware the crash between collapse="isCollapsed" and class="visible-xs" use ui-bootstrap.dropdown Leesei Suggestion 每次test isHide 唔好 響tagNames 加個`active field (boolean) 可以navbarTag onclick (jqlite 嘢) update active state
